name: TowerSwitch
description:
Inputs:

Select tower to place with Q, W, E

Q -> simple turret

W ->AoE turret

E -> Knock backs the enemies

Press SPACE to start

Red enemies acts as switch, when killed the rules of the game go out of control and a new wave is spawned

Game Uploaded for GMTK Jam Out of Control

Assets used : 

animated characters by LimeZu

https://limezu.itch.io/animated-mini-characters

Kenny Assets Tanks

https://kenney.nl/assets/topdown-tanks-redux
